headline: Ballymoney United Ladies lift LWS Super Cup
summary: The NIWFA season concluded with Ballymoney United Ladies beating Greenisland in the Local Women Sport Super Cup Final. It was a double for Ballymoney United Ladies, who had won the League Cup, while Greenisland were […]

headline: Charlton Athletic and Durham Women continue their winning starts
summary: Charlton Athletic and Durham both made it two wins from two in the Barclays Women’s Championship with victories on the road. Durham went top of the table on goal-difference from Charlton ahead of Sunday’s three […]

headline: London City Lionesses sign María Pérez from Barcelona
summary: London City Lionesses have signed World Cup-winning Spanish midfielder María Pérez from Barcelona for am undisclosed fee. She joins on a two-year deal but is currently sidelined following a knee injury in pre-season training. As […]

headline: Southampton Women sign England youth international Lucy Watson
summary: Southampton have signed England youth international forward Lucy Watson on a season-long loan from Chelsea. Watson has been capped at U-17  to U-19 levels, including at the 2022 U-19 Euros in the Czech Republic. The […]

headline: Chelsea Women’s newcomer Veerle Buurman loaned back to PSV
summary: Chelsea have signed Dutch defender Veerle Buurman and loaned her back to PSV Eindhoven for the 2024/25 season. The 18-year-old centre-back, who joins the Blues on a four-year deal, is currently at the FIFA U-20 […]

headline: Crystal Palace Women sign Katie Stengel from NJ/NY Gotham FC
summary: Crystal Palace have brought former Liverpool forward Katie Stengel back to the WSL from NJ/NY Gotham FC on a two-year deal. She scored 17 goals in 33 appearances with Liverpool during the 2022/23 season, while […]

headline: Spurs Women sign Maite Oroz from Real Madrid
summary: Tottenham Hotspur sealed a four-year transfer deadline day deal for Spain international midfielder Maite Oroz from Real Madrid. The 26-year-old, who has 15 caps for her country and four goals, was part of the side […]

headline: Nikita Parris joins Brighton & Hove Albion Women
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion secured the signature of England striker Nikita Parris late on the WSL transfer deadline day. Capped 71 times by the Lionesses and a Euro 2022 winner, Parris joins the Seagulls on […]

headline: Birmingham City Women sign Lee Geum-min from Brighton
summary: Birmingham City have signed South Korea international forward Lee Geum-min on a two-year deal from Brighton & Hove Albion. She has played for her country at the last three World Cups and had a spell […]

headline: Barclays WSL & Championship Summer 2024 Transfer Watch
summary: Keep track of all the 2024 summer transfer window moves involving Barclays WSL and Women’s Championship players with our regularly updated list. Although the WSL transfer window remains open from 24 June through to 13 […]
